comments:
Problem: When viewing the properties of a Port in a WSDL file, select the Extensions  tab, select the button to add a new Extension, select an Extension Category and select Add, start to enter characters for a name, you get NPE and Unhandled event loop.

Steps:
1) Launch the application, create a New Dynamic Web Project, then add a WSDL file to the project.(keep all default setting for the file)
2) When the Design screen appears for the WSDL file, Click on the NewWSDLFileSOAP and select Show Properties.
3) When the properties tab appears, click on the Extensions, then click on the Add button.
4) When the Add Extensions Components screen appears, select SOAP then select the Add button.
5) Start to enter a name and you will get the NPE and Unhandled loop event in the log file.

See attached log file.

This is a shared common dialog located in xsd.ui.

Keith, I've reproduced the problem in both the xsd.ui and wsdl.ui.  We can take a look at this together Keith when you're ready to tackle this one.  Thanks.

Reducing severity to normal.  We are still able to use the dialog to add a category.
This was fixed in bug 202659 for WTP 3.0 M2.
